com.pump.image.gif.block

Class GifImageDataBlock

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.pump.image.gif.block.GifBlock
      • com.pump.image.gif.block.GifImageDataBlock
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    GifConstants

    public class GifImageDataBlock
extends GifBlock
    A block of rasterized image data, encoded via LZW compression.

    When decoded, each value must correspond to a value in the active color table.

    This is not technically a GifGraphicRenderingBlock, because it is, by itself, meaningless. It must be preceded by a GifImageDescriptor block; so that is considered the real "graphic rendering block".
